catalog_info.name: ProVia Doors Catalog
catalog_info.description: Family-owned, faith-based company producing Professional-Class doors

embarq.description: ProVia's highest-efficiency fiberglass entry door system with 2.5-inch thick door, Quad Glass System, dovetailed stiles/rails, and premium wood-like skins. Only available with Emtek hardware.

signet.description: Structurally superior fiberglass doors with robust hardwood stiles and rails dovetailed at each corner. Features exclusive DuraFuse Finishing System.

heritage.description: Fiberglass doors with enhanced woodgrain texture, improved definition embossing and hardwood edge to prevent warping.

legacy.description: Professional-class 20-gauge galvannealed steel doors with 49% more steel than standard 24-gauge. Available in Woodgrain Textured and Smooth Steel.

comfortech_glazing.name: ComforTech Warm Edge Glazing System
comfortech_glazing.description: Measurably improves thermal performance with better energy efficiency and warmer glass edge using Super Spacer technology.
comfortech_glazing.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)

decorative_glass.name: Decorative Glass
decorative_glass.description: Hand-beveled glass assembled by skilled craftsmen with unique glass options in artistically designed patterns.
decorative_glass.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)

dialogue_layered_glass.name: Dialogue Layered Glass
dialogue_layered_glass.description: Multiple frosted layers creating geometric patterns that play with opacity and movement.

styles.name: Repartee
styles.pattern: Geometric grid with squares and trapezoids

inspirations_art_glass.name: Inspirations Art Glass
inspirations_art_glass.description: ProVia exclusive art glass with resin bead designs and hand-applied color fill.

privacy_glass.name: Privacy Glass
privacy_glass.description: Allows light to filter in while keeping high level of privacy.

internal_blinds.name: Internal Blinds
internal_blinds.description: Sturdy aluminum blinds enclosed in tempered safety glass. Easy to clean with no dusting required.

simulated_divided_lites.name: Simulated Divided Lites (SDL)
simulated_divided_lites.description: High-tech stained fiberglass 1 inch wide grids reminiscent of old world craftsmanship.

internal_grids.name: Internal Grids
internal_grids.description: Traditional look with easy cleaning convenience.

external_grids.name: External Grids
external_grids.description: Traditional styling on exterior of glass matching door finish.

stain_finishes.name: Stain Finishes
stain_finishes.description: Hand-applied by professional craftsmen with multi-step oven-cured processes.

glazed_finishes.name: Glazed Finishes
glazed_finishes.description: Distinctive hand-applied finish giving each door a unique aged look through 9-step process.

trilennium_multipoint.name: Trilennium Multi-Point
trilennium_multipoint.description: Three 1 inch deadbolts with anti-saw hardened steel pins and solid I-beam full length.

hoppe_multipoint.name: Hoppe Multi-Point
hoppe_multipoint.description: Four points of latching when locked, one point when unlocked. Stainless steel components.

emtek_mortise.name: Emtek Mortise
emtek_mortise.description: Push-button passage controls with heavy-duty forged brass construction.

emtek_interconnect.name: Emtek Interconnect
emtek_interconnect.description: Panic-proof exit - turning interior knob retracts both deadbolt and passage latches.

brinks_ppr.name: Brinks Push Pull Rotate
brinks_ppr.description: Easiest way to open a door - push, pull, or rotate with one finger, elbow, or hip.

schlage_vintage.name: Schlage Vintage
schlage_vintage.description: Solid cast brass with maximum security deadbolt, tested for 400,000+ cycles.

schlage_electronic.name: Schlage Electronic
schlage_electronic.description: Smart deadbolt and keypad options with smartphone integration.

schlage_classic.name: Schlage Classic
schlage_classic.description: Classic locksets, passage latches, and deadbolts for understated beauty.

speakeasy_hingestraps_clavos.name: Speakeasy, Hinge Straps, Clavos
speakeasy_hingestraps_clavos.description: Old world look options in flat black aluminum.

pet_doors.name: Pet Doors
pet_doors.description: Factory installed on flush doors only.

framesaver.name: FrameSaver
framesaver.description: Wood frame with finger-jointed composite bottom - never absorbs water, warps, cracks or rots.

fusionframe.name: FusionFrame
fusionframe.description: LVL interior + FrameSaver bottom + composite exterior. Prefinished, maintenance-free.

permatech.name: PermaTech Composite
permatech.description: Full composite frame - moisture and insect resistant, never rots or splinters.

steel_lframe.name: Steel L-Frame
steel_lframe.description: 18-gauge steel with 12-gauge welded hinge plate for extra strength.

hinged_patio_doors.name: Hinged Patio Doors
hinged_patio_doors.description: Swinging patio door systems in 2 or 3-lite units with same quality as entry doors.
features: Schlage Flair handleset with Maximum Security deadbolt

vinyl_sliding_patio_doors.name: Vinyl Sliding Patio Doors
vinyl_sliding_patio_doors.description: Tested against stringent industry standards for air/water infiltration, wind load, forced entry.
vinyl_sliding_patio_doors.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)
features: Galvanized steel reinforced panels and sill
AccuVent sash lever (Endure standard, Aspect optional)

overview.name: Storm Doors
overview.description: Individually customized to highest standards with tempered safety glass and lifetime finish warranty.
overview.impact_shield_note: Available in Impact Shield regions but NOT wind-borne debris tested

spectrum.name: Spectrum
spectrum.description: Exclusive top and bottom InVent retractable screen system.

decorator.name: Decorator
decorator.description: Stylish, fresh look to accent your entry.

deluxe.name: Deluxe
deluxe.description: Additional light, ventilation or protection from elements.

duraguard.name: DuraGuard
duraguard.description: Heavy-duty non-removable stainless steel screening for children and pets.

superview.name: Superview
superview.description: Style and value in one complete package.

overview.name: Impact Shield Products
overview.description: Wind-borne debris resistant products approved by State of Florida for storm protection.
patio_door_features: Heavy aluminum interlock on center stile
hardware_restrictions: Trilennium NOT available on French Doors
overview.finish_warranty_note: Lifetime finish warranty limited to 5 years

warranties.impact_shield_note: Finish warranty limited to 5 years in Impact Shield region

dual_finish.note: Different series, style and finish on each side

restrictions: Heritage NOT for Designer Patio Doors
